page.title: 09A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: I GET UP IN THE MORNING AT ABOUT 7.45. AND GET READY FOR SCHOOL.I EITHER RIDE IN A CAR OR BMX OR IN A BUS SOMETIMES I WALK TO SCHOOL. SCHOOL STARTS AT 9.00.WHEN I GET TO SCHOOL I SIT AND READ A BOOK; JOURNEY INTO WAR OR THE MAGICIAN WHO KEPT A PUB. AFTER ASSEMBLY WE EITHER DO ENGLISH,MATHS OR SPELLINGS. DURING THE SUMMER WE SWIM IN OUR SWIMMING POOL EVERY DAY. WE HAVE A BREAK AT 10.30 TILL 10.45. AFTER BREAK WE EITHER HAVE MATHS HANDWRITING ENGLISH OR READING. AT 12.10 WE HAVE OUR DINNER IN OUR HALL.AFTER DINNER WE HAVE BREAK UNTILL 1.20. FOR DINNER SOMETIMES WE HAVE SALAD,STEW AND DUMMPLINGS, SAUSAGE ROLLS OR CHIPS AND AFTER OUR MAIN COURSE WE HAVE A PUDDING. AFTER PLAY WE SOMETIMES DO ART AND OFTEN GO ON NATURE WALKS AROUND THE VILLAGE OR TO THE BEACH. WE FINISH SCHOOL AT 3.30.
